message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I know it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm thinking of an offer around $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This would be a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I believe $11,000 would be a fair price for me to pay.
